messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Uh oh... I'm in trouble with my mom LOL
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, I don t know of any websites, but the only thing I can come up with at the moment, is be there to answer your sisters questions and clean out an extra
messages.messageBody:
Wow, I don't know of any websites, but the only thing I can come up with at
the moment, is be there to answer your sisters questions and clean out an
extra bedroom if she decided to flap her wings. It's fresh, so maybe your
Mom just needs time to adjust. I understand how she feels from where she
sits, but she seems to be ignoring how unhappy your sister is in school.
Maybe encouraging community college classes is the way to go since mom liked
that idea?? She could always try it out over the summer when ps is out and
maybe that will help sway your mom? Gee, I'm sorry because this must be vey
hard for everyone involved.

Best of luck!
Jennifer
